mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO level_raw_ftp( stno, datatime, ch1_avg, ch2_avg )VALUES
#{element.stid}, #{element.lasttime}, #{element.waterlevel}, #{element.voltage}

INSERT INTO rain( stid , _time , elev , rain , min_10 , hour_3 , hour_6 , hour_12 , hour_24 , now )VALUES
#{element.stid}, to_char(#{element.lasttime}::timestamp, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'::text), #{element.voltage}, #{element.rainfall1hour}, #{element.rainfall10min}, #{element.rainfall3hour}, #{element.rainfall6hour}, #{element.rainfall12hour}, #{element.rainfall24hour}, #{element.rainfallCounter}
